name: 陳怡靜
objective:
"Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation. This course is ONLY served to INTERNATIONAL students who are at very beginning level. Exchange students are welcome to take it if it has vacancy. Students are with motivation to study Chinese.
This course is for beginners who start learning Chinese. We'll teach from Pinyin, Hanyu Pinyin is our main material to start our pronunciation. Then daily conversation to real life. Listening and speaking are the most skills for this stage. 
For promoting the bilingual ideal, you'll interact with local students. Teacher would do differentiated instruction, you could work with diverse culture in class as well. Enjoy more than 2 different cultures.
